dmca.title: Matrimonial Services Site Complains to Google (#1)
dmca.body:
Infringement Notification (http://www.chillingeffects.org/dmca512/#FAQID4634)

Monday, June30 [sic], 2003

Dear Google Team,

Following is the form you requested regarding our allegations of stolen copyrighted material by:

http://www.123matrimony.com/
http://www.timesmatch.com/
http://www.keralaconnect.com/

We hope you are able to handle this disregard for the work I have paid for quickly and without trouble.

The copyrighted work (http://www.chillingeffects.org/dmca512/#FAQID4639) at issue is the text that appears on (http://www.chillingeffects.org/dmca512/#FAQID4638)

http://www.shaadi.com
http://www.shaadi.com/jewish-matrimonial/
http://www.shaadi.com/shaadi_info/privacy.php
http://www.shaadi.com/customer_relations/faq/index.php

Content on homepage, help, faqs, meta-tags, link menus, matrimonial profile "No photo" image, format of displaying profiles & categorizing profiles has been simply cut and pasted onto and copied by the following three sites:

http://www.123matrimony.com/
http://www.timesmatch.com/
http://www.keralaconnect.com/


These above mention [sic] three sites involved are owned by one person/company.

2.
Search Query: "Create a Photo profile NOW !"
Infringing Web Pgge: (http://www.chillingeffects.org/dmca512/#FAQID4645)

http://www.123matrimony.com

Search Query: Matrimonials Home Site Map
Infringing Web Page: http://www.123matrimony.com

Search Query: "Jewish matrimonials"
Infringing Web Page: www.123matrimony.com/matrimonial/Jewish-Matrimonials.htm

Search Query "Matrimonial India - Free Indian matrimonials"
Infringing Web Page: http://www.123matrimony.com/

3. Our contact info: [private]@shaadi.com

4. The infringing site has listed: [private]@123matrimony.com as the contact email address.

5. "I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing (http://www.chillingeffects.org/dmca512/#FAQID4643) web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law,

6. "I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act an behalf of the owner of an eXclusive right that is allegedly infringed-"

7. Thank you for your concern with this matter.

[private]
Owner Shaadi.com
Date: June 30, 2003
